summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Weed & Seed Program in Central Seattle; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance in the amount of Two Hundred Twenty Five Thousand Dollars ($225,000); accepting the money when received; increasing the 2001 Budgets of the Police Department and the Human Services Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
